#x ranges are kept, whereas z ranges are ignored (i.e, in this example, x between 170000 and 190000 is kept, but a z equal to 0 will be removed) 
x 1000 19000 1000 19000 1000 19000 1000 19000 1000 19000
x 111000 129000 111000 129000 111000 129000 111000 129000 111000 129000
x 220000 238000 220000 238000 220000 238000 220000 238000 220000 238000
x 330000 348000 330000 348000 330000 348000 330000 348000 330000 348000
x 440000 458000 440000 458000 440000 458000 440000 458000 440000 458000
z 0 0
#z 4000 inf
